original_text: “You are to speak to the people of Israel and say, ‘Above all you shall keep my Sabbaths, for this is a sign between me and you throughout your generations, that you may know that I, the Lord, sanctify you.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르기를 너희는 나의 안식일을 지키라 이는 나와 너희 사이에 너희 대대의 표징이니 나는 너희를 거룩하게 하는 여호와인 줄 너희가 알게 함이라

sentences.original_text: “You are to speak to the people of Israel and say,
‘Above all you shall keep my Sabbaths,
for this is a sign between me and you throughout your generations,
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 너희 대대로 나와 너희 사이의 표징이니,

sentences.original_text: that you may know that I, the Lord, sanctify you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나 주가 너희를 거룩하게 하는 줄 알게 하려 함이라.
